name: I-Exist: Consciousness VR
description:
Every phone has a music player, but yours has a secret. It's a portal into another world, waiting to be opened. Only now, with the power of virtual reality, can you look through the window and step inside. Explore the world of Consciousness and journey through music like never before.

EVERY SONG IS A WORLD
Dive deep into the lyrics of each song as you navigate through a surreal space.

AMBISONIC CHAMBER
Experience exclusive acoustic performances through spatial audio and ambisonic recordings.

FIRESIDE CHAT
Sit fire side with the guys in I-Exist as they tell stories about the songwriting and recording process for each song.
